body:
Cray added necessary functionality for CMake to support fortran preprocessing using `crayftn` (with output in a way that Cmake can process).

This patch is necessary for the current release of cmake (3.19), with the patch expected to be in the 3.20 release of Cmake. The included patch is from kitware.

see https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/-/merge_requests/5882
title: Cmake: Update Cmake 3.19.x to support crayftn preprocessing (cce 11+)
